title: My champions have disappeared?
body:
At level 5 I was mostly using Darius with a little bit of Garen, and thats all I'd being using up until level 5.  I purchased them agessss ago using the RP points you start off with. But the moment I hit level 6 I lost them both, they just disappeared. In my stats they said locked and when I started a match I didnt have the option to choose them. Im not sure if I lost any other champs because these are the only 2 I use. 

Fix?

replies.body:
Strange. Are you sure that you were using the one account, and not another?

If you're 100% sure it was champions being removed from your account, create a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and see what they can do to help you restore them. Having purchase proof of the transactions will help you (you can find that in the store, I believe).
Nevermind. He was free to play. I just didnt realize because Im a nooby level 6 :P

>I purchased them

What did that mean then? What exactly did you do to 'purchase' them?

Or was it just a misuse of terminology?
I bought Garen again and it seemed to have gotten him back for me, but I cant afford Darius for a long time.
